targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum(count_over_time(({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} |= "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time(({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} != "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / 100)
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval])))

sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | status >= 500 |__error__=""[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | __error__=""[$__interval]))/ 100)
sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

topk(10, sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" and  __error__="" [$__interval])))
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | line_format "‚û°Ô∏è {{.request_method}} {{.request_uri}} with HTTP status: {{.status}} "
quantile_over_time(0.95,{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]) by (host)
max by (host) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

topk(10, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json |  http_referer != "" and http_referer !~ ".*?$host.*?" and http_referer !~ ".*?\\*\\*\\*.*?" | __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by (remote_addr, geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval])))

topk(10, sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__="" [$__interval])))
